items.description: A curated list of awesome streaming (stream processing) frameworks, applications, readings and other resources. Inspired by other awesome projects.
items.title: Awesome Streaming

items.description: https://manuzhang.github.io/awesome-streaming/ is a more dynamic website where you can find updates of the awesome projects here.
items.title: Website

items.description: Java] - unified platform for big data stream and batch processing.
items.title: Apache Apex

items.description: Rust] - distributed compute platform powered by Apache Arrow.
items.title: Apache Ballista

items.description: Java] - system for high-throughput, low-latency data stream processing that supports stateful computation, data-driven windowing semantics and iterative stream processing.
items.title: Apache Flink

items.description: Java] - a realtime, distributed, fault-tolerant stream processing engine from Twitter.
items.title: Apache Heron (incubating)

items.description: Scala/Java] - distributed stream processing framework that build on Kafka(messaging, storage) and YARN(fault tolerance, processor isolation, security and resource management).
items.title: Apache Samza

items.description: Scala] - makes it easy to build scalable fault-tolerant streaming applications.
items.title: Apache Spark Streaming

items.description: Clojure/Java] - distributed real-time computation system. Storm is to stream processing what Hadoop is to batch processing.
items.title: Apache Storm

items.description: Rust] - High-performance Rust stream processing engine, providing powerful data stream processing capabilities, supporting multiple input/output sources and processors.
items.title: ArkFlow

items.description: Rust] - a distributed stream processing engine. Supports SQL and Rust pipelines. Scales up to millions of events per second. Supports stateful operations like windows and joins, state checkpointing for fault-tolerance and recovery of pipelines. Uses the Timely Dataflow model.
items.title: Arroyo

items.description: Java] - Uber's Stream Analytics Framework used in production
items.title: AthenaX

items.description: Python] - data parallel, distributed, stateful stream processing framework.
items.title: Bytewax

items.description: Rust/Python] - ETL framework to build fresh index for AI, with realtime incremental updates.
items.title: CocoIndex

items.description: Python] - stream processing library, porting the ideas from Kafka Streams to Python
items.title: Faust

items.description: Scala] - lightweight real-time distributed streaming engine built on Akka.
items.title: Gearpump

items.description: Java] - A general purpose distributed data processing engine, built on top of Hazelcast.
items.title: Hazelcast Jet

items.description: Haskell] - distributed stream processing with exactly-once semantics based on Storm.
items.title: hailstorm

items.description: Python] - A stream processing framework for data scientists, based on Kafka and ReactiveX.
items.title: Maki Nage

items.description: Java] - Netflix's platform to build an ecosystem of realtime stream processing applications
items.title: mantis

items.description: Scala/Java] - mapReduce-style framework for processing fast/streaming data.
items.title: mupd8(muppet)

items.description: C++] - High-performance, general-purpose, end-to-end data-management system for cloud-edge-sensor environments.
items.title: NebulaStream

items.description: Java/Python/Go/Rust] - Kubernetes native stream processing platform with language agnostic framework. Scalable and cost-efficient
items.title: Numaflow

items.description: Clojure] - Distributed, masterless, high performance, fault tolerant data processing.
items.title: Onyx

items.description: Python] - The fastest data processing engine supporting unified workflows for batch, streaming data, and LLM applications.
items.title: Pathway

items.description: Java] - general-purpose, distributed, scalable, fault-tolerant, pluggable platform that allows programmers to easily develop applications for processing continuous unbounded streams of data.
items.title: s4

items.description: Java/C] - Window-Based Hybrid CPU/GPU Stream Processing Engine.
items.title: SABER

items.description: Python/JavaScript/Node.js] - data processing engine for running multiple data processing apps (sequences) written in Python, JavaScript or TypeScript
items.title: Scramjet Cloud Platform

items.description: Java] - dynamic framework for processing high volumn data streams through pipelines.
items.title: SPQR

items.description: C++/Java] - high throughput real-time streaming processing framework built on Hadoop and HBase.
items.title: tigon

items.description:
Java] - Simple elegant stream processing with interactive prototying shell SOL (Stream Operator Language)
Mesos, designed for high performance data processing jobs that require flexibility & control.
items.title: Teknek

items.description: NET/C#] - Trill is a high-performance one-pass in-memory streaming analytics engine from Microsoft Research.
items.title: Trill

items.description: Python] - A fast, stream-processing framework. Wallaroo makes it easy to react to data in real-time. By eliminating infrastructure complexity, going from prototype to production has never been simpler.
items.title: Wallaroo

items.description: C++] - Multi-core Window-Based Stream Processing Engine. LightSaber uses code generation for efficient window aggregation.
items.title: LightSaber

items.description: Haskell] - The streaming database built for IoT data storage and real-time processing.
items.title: HStreamDB

items.description: Golang] - An edge lightweight IoT data analytics/streaming software implemented by Golang, and it can be run at all kinds of resource-constrained edge devices.
items.title: Kuiper

items.description: C++] - A C++17 Data Stream Processing Parallel Library for Multicores and GPUs.
items.title: WindFlow

items.description: Rust] - A PostgreSQL-compatible streaming database that is designed to build event-driven applications, real-time ETL pipelines, continuous analytics services, and feature stores for AI applications. It excels in extracting fresh and consistent insights from real-time event streams, database CDC, and time series data within sub-seconds. It unifies streaming and batch processing, enabling users to ingest, join, and analyze both live and historical data at a cloud scale.
items.title: RisingWave

items.description: Java] - lightweight stream processing library included in Apache Kafka (since 0.10 version).
items.title: Apache Kafka Streams

items.description: C#] - a .Net Stream Processing Library for Apache Kafka
items.title: Streamiz

items.description: Scala] - stream processing library on Akka Actors.
items.title: Akka Streams

items.description: C++] - real-time streams aggregation and catching.
items.title: Daggy

items.description: Go] - Benthos is a high performance and resilient message streaming service, able to connect various sources and sinks and perform arbitrary actions, transformations and filters on payloads
items.title: Benthos

items.description: Scala] - Compositional, streaming I/O library for Scala.
items.title: FS2(prev. 'Scalaz-Stream')

items.description: Python] - powerful and easy-to-use Python library simplifying the process of writing producers and consumers for message queues, handling all the parsing, networking and documentation generation automatically. Supports multiple protocols such as Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ and alike.
items.title: FastStream

items.description: Scala] - high-performance Scala / Scala.js library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs.
items.title: monix

items.description: Python] - a streaming library originally designed for the McLaren Formula 1 racing team that can process high volumes of time-series data with up to nanosecond precision using Apache Kafka as a message broker.
items.title: Quix Streams

items.description: Node.js] functional reactive stream programming framework written on top of Node.js object streams +
items.title: Scramjet Node.js

items.description: Python] functional reactive stream programming framework written from scratch operating on object, string and buffer streams.
items.title: Scramjet Python

items.description: C++] functional reactive stream programming framework written on top of Node.js object streams.
items.title: Scramjet C++

items.description: Java] - Stream Analytics Framework by Hortonworks, designed as a wrapper around existing streaming solutions like Storm. Aimed to allow users to drag-and-drop streaming components to focus on business logic.
items.title: Streamline

items.description: Python] - Airbnb's Real-time Data Analysis and Alerting.
items.title: StreamAlert

items.description: Scala] - A lightweight Reactive Streams Infrastructure Toolkit for Scala.
items.title: Swave

items.description: Python] - A lightweight library for building pipelines to manage continuous streams of data; supports complex pipelines that involve branching, joining, flow control, feedback, back pressure, and so on.
items.title: Streamz

items.description: Java] - A fully embeddable data streaming engine and stream processing API for Java.
items.title: Stream Ops

items.description: Go] - Substation is a cloud native data pipeline and transformation toolkit written in Go.
items.title: Substation

items.description: Python] - A python library for constructing dataflow graphs. Supports synchronous, reactive data streams built using python generators that mimic complex event processors, as well as lazily-evaluated acyclic graphs and functional currying streams.
items.title: Tributary

items.description: Go] - An open source Streaming Serverless Framework for building Low-latency Geo-distributed system. YoMo Built atop  and Functional Reactive Programming interface.
items.title: YoMo

items.description: Cross-platform, customizable ML solutions for live and streaming media.
items.title: Mediapipe

items.description: Java] - An application of a stateful stream processing for workflow as Java code (microservices orchestration, business process automation, and more).
items.title: javactrl-kafka

items.description: Python/Java] - A platform for real-time streaming search.
items.title: straw

items.description: Java] - Web crawler SDK based on Apache Storm.
items.title: storm-crawler

items.description: Java] - Cross-platform, API gateway built for event-driven architectures and streaming that supports standard protocols such as HTTP, SSE, gRPC, MQTT and the native Kafka protocol.
items.title: Zilla

items.description: Go] - lightweight stream processing engine for IoT.
items.title: sensorbee

items.description: Java] - a programming model and runtime that enables continuous streaming analytics on gateways and edge devices which can work with centralized systems to provide efficient and timely analytics across the whole IoT ecosystem: from the center to the edge, opens sourced by IBM.
items.title: Apache Edgent

items.description: Java] - a self-service (Industrial) IoT toolbox to enable non-technical users to connect, analyze and explore IoT data streams.
items.title: Apache StreamPipes

items.description: Java, Python, SQL, Scala, Go] - unified model and set of language-specific SDKs for defining and executing data processing workflows, and also data ingestion and integration flows, supporting Enterprise Integration Patterns (EIPs) and Domain Specific Languages (DSLs), open sourced by Google.
items.title: Apache Beam

items.description: Scala] - a DSL that builds DAGs on top of Samza and provides exactly-once semantics.
items.title: coast

items.description: Java] - component for complex event processing (CEP) and event series analysis.
items.title: Esper

items.description: Python] - lets you run Python code against real-time streams of data via Apache Storm.
items.title: Streamparse

items.description: Scala] - library that lets you write MapReduce programs that look like native Scala or Java collection transformations and execute them on a number of well-known distributed MapReduce platforms, including Storm and Scalding.
items.title: summingbird

items.description: Scala/Java] - distributed, partitioned, replicated commit log service, which provides the functionality of a messaging system, but with a unique design.
items.title: Apache Kafka

items.description: Java] - distributed pub-sub messaging platform with a very flexible messaging model and an intuitive client API.
items.title: Apache Pulsar

items.description: Java] - distributed messaging and streaming platform with low latency, high performance and reliability, trillion-level capacity and flexible scalability.
items.title: Apache RocketMQ

items.description: Scala/Java] - cloud-first alternative to Kafka by decoupling durability to S3 and EBS. 100% Kafka compatible. 10x cost-effective. Autoscale in seconds. Single-digit ms latency.
items.title: AutoMQ

items.description: Java] - a distributed system intended for streaming data between various heterogeneous source and destination systems with high reliability and throughput at scale from Linkedin (replaced databus).
items.title: brooklin

items.description: Go] - End-to-end data pipeline tool combining ingestion from 50+ sources, SQL/Python transformations, and built-in data quality checks in a single CLI.
items.title: Bruin

items.description: Java] - Linkedin's Kafka -> HDFS pipeline.
items.title: camus

items.description: Java] - Linkedin's source-agnostic distributed change data capture system.
items.title: databus

items.description: Java] - distributed, reliable, and available service for efficiently collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of log data.
items.title: flume

items.description: Rust/WASM] - Real-time programmable data streaming platform with in-line computation capabilities.
items.title: fluvio

items.description: Python] - CLI tool to copy data between any source and destination with a single command. Supports 50+ connectors including databases, SaaS apps, and data warehouses.
items.title: ingestr

items.description: golang] - Distributed streaming infrastructure built on cloud storage which makes it easy to mix and match batch and streaming paradigms.
items.title: Gazette

items.description: C++] - a high-performant distributed system by Facebook for streaming and storing sequential data, using a log structure.
items.title: LogDevice

items.description: Java] - Taobao's high available, high performance distributed messaging system
items.title: metaq

items.description: Go] - fast disk-backed messaging solution
items.title: NATS streaming

items.description: Go] - realtime distributed messaging platform designed to operate at scale, handling billions of messages per day.
items.title: nsq

items.description: C++] - Redpanda is Kafka compatible, ZooKeeper-free, JVM-free and source available.
items.title: Redpanda

items.description: Go] - an open source customer data infrastructure (segment, mparticle alternative).
items.title: RudderStack

items.description: Java] - data pipeline service for collecting, aggregating, and dispatching large volume of application events including log data.
items.title: suro

items.description: Java] - distributed streaming machine learning (ML) framework that contains a programing abstraction for distributed streaming ML algorithms.
items.title: Apache Samoa

items.description: Java] - sketches library from Yahoo!.
items.title: DataSketches

items.description: Numalogic] () [Python] - Collection of ML models and libraries for real-time anomaly detection and forecasting on time series data. Built on Numaflow, a K8s native stream processing platform
items.title: https://github.com/numaproj/numalogic

items.description: Python] - online machine learning library.
items.title: River

items.description: Scala] - mining Big Data streams using Spark Streaming from Huawei.

items.description: Python] - Provides a webserver to quickly setup and evaluate possible solutions to contextual multi-armed bandit (cMAB) problems.
items.title: StreamingBandit

items.description: Java] - enables the use of Apache Storm for video processing by adding computer vision (CV) specific operations and data model.
items.title: StormCV

items.description: Java] - realtime online machine learning library based on Trident.
items.title: trident-ml

items.description: Scala] - Anomaly detection framework built on Spark Structured Streaming from Paypal.
items.title: yurita

items.description: C] - An open-source relational database that runs SQL queries continuously on streams, incrementally storing results in tables.
items.title: pipelinedb

items.description: Java] - Squall executes SQL queries on top of Storm for doing online processing.
items.title: squall

items.description: Java] - Continuous Query Language on RealTime Computation System.

items.description: Java] - A cloud-native, source-available  purpose-built for stream processing applications
items.title: ksqlDB

items.description: Rust] - A source-available streaming SQL engine for maintaining materialized views on data from message brokers and databases.
items.title: Materialize

items.description: Java] - A cloud native Streaming and Complex Event Processing engine that understands Streaming SQL queries in order to capture events from diverse data sources, process them, detect complex conditions, and publish output to various endpoints in real time.
items.title: Siddhi

items.description: C++] - A unified streaming and historical data analytics database in a single binary, powered by ClickHouse.
items.title: Proton

items.description: Java] - a simple storm performance/stress test.
items.title: storm-perf-test

items.description: Java] - Benchmarks for Low Latency (Streaming) solutions including Apache Storm, Apache Spark, Apache Flink, etc.
items.title: streaming-benchmarks

items.description: Go] - Automated message queue orchestration for scaled-up benchmarking.
items.title: flotilla

items.description: Scala, Java] - Fork of Akka 2.6.x, prior to the Akka project's adoption of the Business Source License.
items.title: Apache Pekko

items.description: Python] - Actor based event driven concurrent framework for Python.

items.description: Java/C++] - efficient reliable unicast and multicast message transport.
items.title: aeron

items.description: Java] - stream processing tool designed to help build and monitor processing workflows.
items.title: StreamFlow

items.description: Java] - uses Luwak, a stored-query engine built on Lucene, to implement full-text search on streams.

items.description: Go/Node.js/Python] - A tool to embed privacy controls in your application code to detect PII as it enters and leaves your systems, preventing it from reaching unintended data streams or pipelines.
